channel.title: Comments on: Today, I’m hating travelling
channel.description: my little place on the web

item.title: By: HunterTongCom

item.description: @stefancarlton for the whole time that you're not in England you can have my car! (not allowed to sell it or let anyone else use it though)
item.content:encoded: @stefancarlton for the whole time that you’re not in England you can have my car! (not allowed to sell it or let anyone else use it though)
